plugin_desc: The JMX-JVM collection plugin is a tool used for gathering Java Virtual Machine (JVM) performance data, including memory usage, garbage collection, thread counts, and CPU usage. It helps monitor the health and performance of Java applications.
name: JVM

metrics.name: jmx_scrape_duration_seconds_gauge
metrics.description: The duration of the most recent JMX monitoring data collection, measured in seconds, is used to evaluate the performance of data collection.

metrics.name: jmx_scrape_error_gauge
metrics.description: Indicates whether there is a failure during the JMX scraping process. A non-zero value indicates a failure

metrics.name: jvm_memory_usage_init_value
metrics.description: The size of memory initialized and allocated when the Java Virtual Machine starts, reflecting the initial memory configuration

metrics.name: jvm_memory_usage_committed_value
metrics.description: The current size of memory committed for use by the Java Virtual Machine, which can be used to assess memory resource occupancy

metrics.name: jvm_memory_usage_used_value
metrics.description: The current actual amount of memory used by the Java Virtual Machine, directly reflecting the memory usage

metrics.name: jvm_memory_usage_max_value
metrics.description: The maximum amount of memory used by the Java Virtual Machine during operation, which can be used to detect memory pressure and leaks

metrics.name: jvm_threads_total_started_count_value
metrics.description: The total number of threads created and started by the Java Virtual Machine since startup, showing the scale of thread creation

metrics.name: jvm_threads_daemon_count_value
metrics.description: The current number of active daemon threads in the Java Virtual Machine. Daemon threads are used to serve other threads

metrics.name: jvm_threads_peak_count_value
metrics.description: The peak number of threads during the operation of the Java Virtual Machine, which can assist in analyzing peak thread resource usage

metrics.name: jvm_threads_count_value
metrics.description: The current number of running threads in the Java Virtual Machine, real-time reflecting thread activity

metrics.name: jvm_threads_current_user_time_value
metrics.description: The CPU time spent by the current threads in the Java Virtual Machine executing user code, used to analyze thread performance

metrics.name: jvm_os_memory_physical_free_value
metrics.description: The current available size of physical memory in the system, reflecting the remaining memory resources

metrics.name: jvm_os_memory_physical_total_value
metrics.description: The total capacity of physical memory in the system, which is a fixed parameter of the hardware configuration

metrics.name: jvm_os_memory_swap_free_value
metrics.description: The current available size of swap space in the system, used to temporarily store data when physical memory is insufficient

metrics.name: jvm_os_memory_swap_total_value
metrics.description: The total capacity of swap space in the system, determining the upper limit of expandable virtual memory

metrics.name: jvm_os_memory_committed_virtual_value
metrics.description: The size of virtual memory committed for use by the Java Virtual Machine, reflecting the occupancy of virtual memory resources

metrics.name: jvm_os_available_processors_value
metrics.description: The current number of processor cores available for executing threads in the system, affecting the program's parallel processing ability

metrics.name: jvm_os_processcputime_seconds_value
metrics.description: jvm_memorypool_usage_init_value / (1024 * 1024)

metrics.name: jvm_bufferpool_count_value
metrics.description: The number of buffer objects in the BufferPool of Java NIO, used to monitor the scale of the resource pool

metrics.name: jvm_bufferpool_memoryused_value
metrics.description: The current size of memory used by the BufferPool in Java NIO, reflecting the usage of the resource pool

metrics.name: jvm_bufferpool_totalcapacity_value
metrics.description: The total memory capacity of the BufferPool in Java NIO, showing the maximum carrying capacity of the resource pool

metrics.name: jvm_gc_collectiontime_seconds_value
metrics.description: The total cumulative time consumed by garbage collection operations in the Java Virtual Machine, used to evaluate GC performance

metrics.name: jvm_gc_collectioncount_value
metrics.description: The cumulative number of garbage collection operations in the Java Virtual Machine, reflecting the frequency of GC activities

metrics.name: jvm_memorypool_usage_init_value
metrics.description: The initialized memory usage of the memory pool in the Java Virtual Machine, reflecting the initial state of the memory pool

metrics.name: jvm_memorypool_usage_committed_value
metrics.description: The current committed memory usage of the memory pool in the Java Virtual Machine, showing the occupancy of memory pool resources

metrics.name: jvm_memorypool_usage_used_value
metrics.description: The current actual memory usage of the memory pool in the Java Virtual Machine, directly reflecting the usage level of the memory pool

metrics.name: jvm_memorypool_usage_max_value
metrics.description: The maximum memory usage ever reached by the memory pool during the operation of the Java Virtual Machine, which can detect memory pool pressure
